byline.contributor: Caroline Chauvet and Christian Haimet contributed reporting.

abstract: Paris terrorist attacks by Islamic State have sparked patriotic wave in France unseen in many years, with thousands of people seeking to join military and police forces; sales of French flag, which is not often displayed, have soared; surge in recruits is similar to that in United States after Sept 11 attacks.
lead_paragraph: The nation is showing its patriotic fervor after the ISIS killings, from a jump in sales of French flags to a surge in enlistment applications.

headline.main: Paris Attacks Have Many in France Eager to Join the Fight
headline.print_headline: Attacks Stoke French Fervor to Join Fight

snippet: The nation is showing its patriotic fervor after the ISIS killings, from a jump in sales of French flags to a surge in enlistment applications.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
